block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Designated INF Keith Johnson for assignment. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Named David Glass chairman of the board. Placed Ruth Glass, Dan Glass, Donald Glass, Dayna Martz. Herk Robinson and Julia Irene Kauffman on the board. Named Robinson chief operating officer and Dan Glass president. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Named Scott Kelyman general manager of St. Petersburg of the FSL.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Designated INF Keith Johnson for assignment. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Named David Glass chairman of the board. Placed Ruth Glass, Dan Glass, Donald Glass, Dayna Martz. Herk Robinson and Julia Irene Kauffman on the board. Named Robinson chief operating officer and Dan Glass president. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Named Scott Kelyman general manager of St. Petersburg of the FSL.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Optioned OF Roosevelt Brown to Iowa of the Pacific Coast League. MONTREAL EXPOS--Recalled RHP Jeremy Powell from Ottawa of the International League. Optioned INF Andy Powell to Ottawa. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Activated RHP Jason Schmidt from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Brad Clontz to Nashville of the PCL. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Placed 3B Fernando Tatis on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B-OF Larry Sutton from Memphis of the PCL.
Women's National Basketball Association WASHINGTON MYSTICS--Announced F Valerie Still will sit out the season for personal reasons.
National Football League KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Named Bill Kuharich director of pro personnel. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed WR Bert Emanuel to a one-year contract.
Major League Soccer METROSTARS--Waived D Mohammad Khakpour.
